title: Poster, "Vision... Mission... Goal, IBM Latin America", 1950–90
medium: Offset lithograph on thick white paper
signed: Signed in gray/brown upper right corner
inscribed: Imprinted in black ink lower 1/3 of page: Vision/The most admired, competitive, and successful company...anywhere.../Mission/To provide information technology solutions in Latin America:/Maximize customers, employee, and shareholder satisfaction.../Sustain growth and optimize returns.../Continue to be recognized as a national asset.../Goals/Customer satisfaction...People satisfaction...Growth and leadership.../ National asset...IBM (logo)...Latin America
description: Upper 2/3 of page 5 color bands (rectangles) of differing lengths; colors (left to right): fuscia, blue, green, yellow, and orange.  Text blocks underneath in black describing vision, mission, and goals of IBM.
